Here is some help to anyone bobbing their heads and confused. Unzip the first file in the folder that you get, just the first one. Now you have something with a .iso extension in that folder, look for it if you don't see it. Now you take that and load it into Daemon tools, do not understand what that is? Please google it. It's a free tool. Now you will either be prompted to run it by your computer or by the Daemon tools, run it. VOILA it will be ready for setup.

Step 2 or something: Now you need a keygen and crack. IT's IN the file!! Just go to my computer, then you'll see that Sims university is loaded in your drive, so right click on it and go to OPEN. Now you will see a bunch of files, find "Fairlight". Everything you need is in there. 

It works, i promise, just do that and you'll be ok :)

Thank you!

I really hate these 001 002 etc files. Anyway, if you're stupid like I am, open WinRAR (assuming you have it). Go to OPEN and manually go to the place where this torrent downloaded. You may not see anything in the folder cause the program is looking for .rars or .zips. In the lower right drop-down menu, select "All Files" so everything is shown. Select "flt-s3ul.001". The program will now show what's inside the 001 file. (which is an .iso file) Right click that file, and select "extract" (or something like that) The .iso will be extracted to the folder with the 001 002 etc files. Mount the .iso onto DAEMONTools (assuming you have it too, lol) and load up dat .iso. Make sure you browse the insides of the .iso to get the crack. It's INSIDE the .iso file. (the crack is in a folder called "Fairlight". Goodluck guys. Also, put the crack files into THE SIMS 3 FOLDER, NOT University's.
